review_data.title: Pretty good fast food in a shopping mall food court
review_data.content: Hitzberger is a Swiss chain of quality fast food restaurants. You can find them in shopping malls (Glatt Zentrum, Sihl CIty), train stations (SBB Zurich in the new underground shopping mall above tracks 31-34) and near city centres (Basel Aeschenplatz).
